verses.verse: (A Psalm of David.) <S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H238>Give<s%> <S%H238>ear<s%> to my <S%H8469>supplications!<s%> <S%H6030>Answer<s%> me in Thy <S%H530>faithfulness,<s%> in Thy <S%H6666>righteousness!<s%>
And do not <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H4941>judgment<s%> with Thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> For in Thy <S%H6440>sight<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2416>man<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> is <S%H6663>righteous.<s%>

For the <S%H340>enemy<s%> has <S%H7291>persecuted<s%> my <S%H5315>soul;<s%> He has <S%H1792>crushed<s%> my <S%H9130>life<s%> to the <S%H776>ground;<s%> He has made me <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H4285>dark<s%> <S%H4285>places,<s%> like those who have <S%H5769>long<s%> been <S%H4191>dead.<s%>
Therefore my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is <S%H5848>overwhelmed<s%> <S%H5921>within<s%> me; My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H8074>appalled<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> me.

I <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6924>old;<s%> I <S%H1897>meditate<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> Thy <S%H6467>doings;<s%> I <S%H7878>muse<s%> on the <S%H4639>work<s%> of Thy <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
I <S%H6566>stretch<s%> out my <S%H3027>hands<s%> to Thee; My <S%H5315>soul<s%> [longs] for Thee, as a <S%H5889>parched<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

<S%H6030>Answer<s%> me <S%H4118>quickly,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H3615>fails;<s%> Do not <S%H5641>hide<s%> Thy <S%H6440>face<s%> from me, Lest I <S%H4911>become<s%> <S%H4911>like<s%> those who <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit.<s%>

Let me <S%H8085>hear<s%> Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> For I <S%H982>trust<s%> in Thee; <S%H3045>Teach<s%> me the <S%H1870>way<s%> in <S%H2098>which<s%> I should <S%H1980>walk;<s%> For to Thee I <S%H5375>lift<s%> up my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> from my <S%H340>enemies;<s%> I <S%H3680>take<s%> <S%H3680>refuge<s%> in Thee.
<S%H3925>Teach<s%> me to <S%H6213>do<s%> Thy will, For Thou art my <S%H430>God;<s%> Let Thy <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H5148>lead<s%> me on <S%H4334>level<s%> <S%H776>ground.<s%>
For the <S%H4616>sake<s%> of Thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2421>revive<s%> me. In Thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H3318>bring<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> out of <S%H6869>trouble.<s%>

And in Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> <S%H6789>cut<s%> <S%H6789>off<s%> my <S%H340>enemies,<s%> And destroy <S%H6>all<s%> those who <S%H3605>afflict<s%> my <S%H6887>soul;<s%> For I am Thy <S%H5315>servant.<s%>
